learning.title: Developer
learning.description: You will learn fundamental knowledge in IT and level up in the direction of product management. Get a sought-after profession and the opportunity to open a business in the field of information technology.

learning.title: UI/UX Designer
learning.description: The main course in the profession of UX designer. Short training period, theory and practice on real problems.

learning.title: 3D Modeling
learning.description: Basic course in 3D modeling. Theory and practice in a short time. Work with real tasks and projects.

Courses.title: Developer
Courses.description: You will learn fundamental knowledge in IT and level up in the direction of product management. Get a sought-after profession and the opportunity to open a business in the field of information technology.

Courses.title: Frontend Developer
Courses.description: You will gain basic knowledge and in practice learn how to create websites and applications, design interfaces and work with complex front-end developer tools.

Courses.title: JavaScript Programmer
Courses.description: Become a JavaScript developer to write websites and animate their content. You will be able to create interactive and dynamic web applications using the full power of technologies available in the browser.

Courses.title: Frontend Developer Master
Courses.description: This is a training program during which you will learn and master the fundamentals of programming, basic computer science concepts, digital technologies, software, operating systems, databases, analytics systems, programming languages and more.

Courses.title: DevOps Engineer
Courses.description: Learn to control and automate the work of development and administration departments

Courses.title: C++ Software Engineer
Courses.description: This is a training program during which you will learn and master the fundamentals of programming, basic computer science concepts, digital technologies, software, operating systems, databases, analytics systems, programming languages and more.

Courses.title: Java Programmer
Courses.description: Get trained as a Java software engineer. You will gain basic knowledge of algorithms, learn the Java language in practice and be able to create network chats, applications, mobile games and other services.

Courses.title: Python Software Engineer
Courses.description: This is a training program during which you will learn and master the fundamentals of programming, basic computer science concepts, digital technologies, software, operating systems, databases, analytics systems, programming languages and more.

Courses.title: MERN Developer
Courses.description: This is a training program during which you will learn and master the fundamentals of programming, basic computer science concepts, digital technologies, software, operating systems, databases, analytics systems, programming languages and more.

Courses.title: React Developer
Courses.description: This is a training program during which you will learn and master the fundamentals of programming, basic computer science concepts, digital technologies, software, operating systems, databases, analytics systems, programming languages and more.

IT.title: Test Engineer
IT.description: This is a 12-month training program during which you will make an informed choice of specialization, gain basic knowledge, and, as a result, get a job or open your own business in IT.

IT.title: Manual Testing
IT.description: This is a super-intensive training program for those who want to quickly understand IT and gain in-demand skills. You will be able to master the profession of a manual tester.

IT.title: Test Automation
IT.description: You will gain basic knowledge, make an informed choice of career trajectory, gain skills in manual and automated testing, and eventually find a job.

IT.title: Data Analyst
IT.description: You will gain basic knowledge, make an informed choice of specialization, gain analytical skills, and eventually find a job.

IT.title: Business Analyst
IT.description: You will gain basic knowledge, make an informed choice of specialization, gain analytical skills, and eventually find a job.

IT.title: Big Data Analyst
IT.description: This program includes 12 months of training and 3 months of technology specialization. You will gain basic knowledge, make an informed choice of direction, upgrade your research and reporting skills.

IT.title: Systems Analyst
IT.description: You will learn fundamental knowledge in IT and pump in the direction of data analysis. Get a sought-after profession and the opportunity to open a business in the field of information technology

IT.title: Network Engineer
IT.description: Learn to configure equipment and routing protocols, design secure and scalable networks, automate routine work

IT.title: DevOps Engineer
IT.description: Learn to control and automate the work of development and administration departments

IT.title: System Administrator
IT.description: Learn to maintain servers, design and administer a local network

design.title: 3D Modeling
design.description: Basic course in 3D modeling. Theory and practice in a short time. Work with real tasks and projects.

design.title: Graphic Designer
design.description: Basic course in graphic designing. Theory and practice in a short time. Design logos, corporate identity, advertising and print layouts

design.title: UI/UX Designer
design.description: The main course in the profession of UX designer. Short training period, theory and practice on real problems.

design.title: Web Designer
design.description: Basic web design course. The course includes theory and practice and will help you create beautiful and user-friendly websites. Training in a short time.

design.title: Residential interior designer
design.description: You will master ArchiCAD, 3ds Max + Corona and interior design theory, create 4 projects of varying complexity. Learn how to work with a customer and in a team - you will be able to compete with practitioners.
